transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello ji baat kar raha hu

Customer: Ha bataiye
Executive: Bolye
Customer: Ji ji ji se baat kar raha tha senior manager India mart office se kaise hain aap
Customer: Badhiya
Executive: Sir aapka ek concern chala tha na yaha pe aapko kuch services me issues face kar rahe the kya problem aa rahi hai sir
Customer: Hmm
Executive: Aapki taraf se mere ko koi by lead nahi hai koi bhi inquiry nahi hai kuch nahi chal raha hai
Executive: By lead inquiry nahi hai sir aisa to nahi hai aap kafi sari leads utha rahe hain sir baat bhi ho rahi hai aapki problem kaha aa rahi hai usme
Customer: Hmm
Customer: Jo lead aa rahi hai na wo ek bhi genuine lead nahi aa rahi hai sari ki sari hamare relevant koi lead hi nahi aa rahi hai
Customer: Abhi kuch na kuch to uthana padega na isliye
Executive: Aapke relevant ko lead nahi aa rahi
Customer: Ha yahi masala to yahi hai
Executive: Apna business to sir pan India hai waise
Customer: Ha pan India hai
Executive: To pan India me sir leads aap le rahe hain aap kafi sari matlab aap le rahe hain high pressure cooperative water jet cleaning machines wagera ki
Customer: Water jet cleaning machine ka to hamara koi product hai hi nahi aisa hum log service de rahe hain machine nahi bech rahe hain
Executive: Accha service dete hain na
Customer: Ha
Executive: Nahi aap sir machine service dono ki le rahe hain na to mujhe laga shayad machine bhi de rahe honge kyuki aap service ki lead bhi le rahe ho beech beech me machine ya pump ki bhi le le rahe ho aap
Customer: Abhi kuch to milna chahiye na to mai soch raha hu kuch nahi mil raha to kuch na kuch to sahi hai na to wo to sahi hai
Executive: Wo to sahi hai but sir chalo agar mai machine wali hata bhi du to industrial cleaning services wagera ki bhi sir kafi sari aap leads le rahe hain matlab alag alag na
Customer: To usme kya matlab kya baat hui hai
Executive: Hmm ha industrial industrial cleaning aapki taraf se mere ko recommend kara ja raha hai ki aap industrial cleaning le lo to humne industrial cleaning liya aaj hi maine ek uthai thi industrial cleaning ka to usme kya wo floor cleaning karwana hai usme
Customer: Apna main main product hamara jo hai main service hai wo heat exchanger hai condenser hai chiller condenser hai ye sab apne hai main main
Executive: Condenser ki cleaning brush
Customer: Condenser tube cleaning
Executive: Exchange tube cleaning hai na Bengaluru ki aayi hai Chennai ki aayi hai
Customer: To ye matlab ye bhi aa rahi hai sir
Executive: Condenser cleaning kidhar hai aap bataiye mai abhi portal abhi abhi search karke baitha hu mai
Customer: Maine sara search kiya sab kuch dekha usme
Executive: Aapne jo uthai hai mai uski baat kar raha hu aapne jo char panch din pehle uthai hai wo unki baat kar raha hu mai aap khol ke ek baar dekhiye jo aapne uthai hai mai unki baat kar raha hu abhi jo available hai unki baat nahi kar raha hu jo aapne li hai unki baat kar raha hu
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm
Customer: Ye jo maine li hui hai na ye log kya hai inko job chahiye
Customer: Usme maine screenshot bhi diya tha ye sevan ko sevan mujahid ko
Executive: Accha ha logo ko job chahiye to wo log usme post kar rahe hain
Customer: Aisa hai mai aap batao aapka personal mere ko whatsapp number aap mere ko hi karke bhejo mai aapko bhejta hu
Executive: Nahi wo aap sevan ke number pe dal do job ke liye kitni matlab job ke liye kitni kya daily requirement aa rahi hai job ke liye kabhi kabhi ho gayi kyuki sir agar daily aa rahi hai to to problem hai kabhi mahine me ek do baar agar aa ja rahi hai to mai
Customer: Bhi koi check kar raha ho ya koi requirement post kar raha ho services wagera hai na
Executive: Aap ek aap ek kam karenge kya kal mere ko 11 baje ke lamsam call karenge kya mai aapko pura ka pura data ke sath mai aapko batata hu mai
Executive: Kal subah 11 baje
Customer: Mai ha kal subah 11 baje aap mere ko connect karo na mai pura abhi aaj data nikal ke baithta hu fir aapko kal subah 11 baje aapko baat karta hu mai
Executive: Koi dikkat wali baat nahi hai sir to subah 11 baje ya to fir video meeting me aap baith jao kal video meeting me baith jaunga
Customer: Nahi video meeting pe to nahi ho payega possible kyuki mai kya hai company company me hu mai aapko ye baat kar lete phone pe mai aapko bata dunga jitna bhi maine kya by lead kiya kis se kya baat hui hai sara ka sara aapko bata dunga
Executive: Hmm hmm kyuki sir job ke liye na jaise tower cleaning services hai ab tower cleaning services me aisa lag raha hai ki shayad aap job bhi dete honge sunne me lagta hai aisa to customer kabhi kabhi ho sakta hai approach kare us tarike ki lead aapke pass chali jaye ha agar frequent ho raha hai to ek baar check karna padega ki ya hum product ka name change kar sakte hain category change kar sakte hain ya fir fir bhi agar aa raha hai to ek baar team ko dal ke mai block karwa sakta hu
Executive: Thoda bahut to sir ek aad percent man lo aa raha hai to wo to isi wajah se hoga baki agar bahut jyada ho raha hai to wo to ek baar check mai bhi mai bhi wahi bolta hu agar ek do hai to mushkil nahi hai chalo theek hai do char aati hai aisi lekin hamare yaha pe jitni bhi mere pass jitni bhi aapki by lead jo mere pass show kar rahi hai wo koi bhi matlab dalta hai kisi ko floor cleaning karni hai kisi ko bas usne dal diya usko kuch nahi chahiye inquiry ke liye dal diya ab dal diya to usko wo bolta hai ki mere ko do mahine baad service chahiye aisa hai
Customer: Hmm hmm
Customer: Abhi aapka mere ko ek free cement ka inquiry mila tha Chhattisgarh ka
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm Chhattisgarh ka free cement ka service me thodi si problem ye wali rehti hai relevancy wali kyuki service bahut tarike ki hoti hai aapke product land me bhi aur alag alag category bhi aati hai usme thodi bahut problem hoti hai mai samajh raha hu aapki baat koi baat nahi
Customer: Aapki baat sahi hai meri baat suniye hum ek saal ke lamsam pahuch rahe hain India mart pe abhi sahi hai na humne abhi tak do paise ka work nahi kiya India mart se
Executive: Aap samajh rahe hain na mujhe mai kya bol raha hu to mujhe to problem hogi samajh raha hu samajh raha hu sir aap kya keh rahe hain agar mujhe aapke pass se 10 percent bhi agar maine business kiya rehta na saal bhar me to bhi mai aapke pass koi concern dalta hi nahi aur concern kya hai ki hamara sevan mujahid aur ek koi madam hai mujhe unka naam nahi malum hai jo unki senior manager hai unhone mujhe aaj se lamsam 10 15 din pehle ek hamara maine sevan ko baat kiya tha to sevan ne bola ki madam 10 15 minute me free hoti hai aapko call pe baat karte hain hamare whatsapp pe message bhi pada hai uske baad maine unse reply manga madam aapne abhi tak mere ko na hi call kiya na hi meri samasya ka hal diya hai na hi uska koi solution mila abhi madam ki taraf se koi jawab nahi hai na hi sevan ki taraf se koi jawab tha wapas maine 10 din intzar kiya 10 din intzar kiya intzar karne ke baad me maine fir wapas India mart ke jo toll free number hai usme call kiya
Executive: Problem yaha pe hai agar aapka aisa feedback hai bilkul theek hai mai aapka feedback genuine hai ek baar mai in logo se discuss bhi karta hu kya hai kya nahi hai ek baar one on one baith ke phone pe bula ke sabke sath fir ek baar kal aapse connect karta hu subah 11 baje mujhe aap ek baat bataiye maine abhi paisa dala India mart me agar hum waha se 10 paise bhi nahi kamayenge to humko to problem ho rahi hai na
Executive: Nahi bilkul theek hai sir aap apni jagah sahi hai aur yaha se bhi jaruri hai bilkul theek hai aur hum bilkul theek hai aur hum pura pura din online hai isme aur fir bhi humko agar kuch nahi mil raha hai to ye problem wala case to hai hi
Executive: Nahi bilkul theek hai sir aur baki koi agar dikkat yaha se aa rahi hai to account manager se mai ek baar baat karunga nahi hoga to change karunga agar koi aisi problem aa rahi hai kyuki phone to uthana chahiye response bhi karna chahiye to obvious si baat hai mai ek baar in logo se discuss karta hu pehle samajhta hu sari cheeze fir kal ek baar aapke sath bhi subah 11 baje baithta hu
Customer: Ha phone to theek hai un logo ne ek whatsapp group banaya fir alag se aapke sevan ki taraf se group banaya whatsapp usme update dene ke liye to usme maine usi group me message kiya sab logo ne message seen kiya lekin reply kisi ne nahi diya usme char log group me add hai aapke India mart ke shayad teen log hai chatha mai group me hu un teeno logo ne message seen kiya lekin reply kisi ne nahi diya
Executive: Mai mai check karwata hu sir aap nishchint rahiye aapki problem mere liye priority pe hai aap mujhe samay de ek baar kal tak ka subah ek baar aapse 11 baje baat karunga usse pehle in logo se bhi ek baar samajhta hu kya hai kya nahi hai
Customer: Hmm ha ha bilkul bilkul boss theek hai sir koi dikkat nahi kal ek baar 11 baje aapse connect karta hu mai morning me
Customer: Ha ha okay okay okay okay
Executive: Theek hai okay
summary:
Concerns:

- No genuine buyleads, mostly irrelevant leads.

- No resolution from Sevan or senior manager.

- No business generated despite being a paid member.

- Job postings instead of relevant business inquiries.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the issue.

- Executive will discuss with the team.

- Executive will connect next day at 11 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, irrelevant leads, customer support, follow up
